titleStmt.title: Gratiae theatrales, or, A choice ternary of English plays composed upon especial occasions by several ingenious persons.
titleStmt.author: T. W., fl. 1662. Thorny-abbey.
Watson, Thomas, d. 1686.

notesStmt.note: "Never before published, but now printed at the request of sundry ingenious friends."
Thorny-abbey has been attributed (probably erroneously) to Thomas Watson.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
Thorny-Abbey, or, The London maid / by T.W.--The marriage-broker, or, The pander / by M.W.--Grim the collier of Croydon, or, The devil and his dame / by I.T.
